hero.title: The digital copilot that elevates nutrition and training into premium experiences.
hero.subtitle: Combine conversational AI, computer vision and interactive dashboards to deliver personalised plans, export PDFs and track progress in real time—without leaving the browser.
hero.benefitSecurity: GDPR-ready, SSO and daily backups included.
hero.benefitAutomation: Automated workflows across Supabase, Stripe and PDF plans.
hero.highlight: NutriFit AI accelerates discovery, shortens response times and keeps plans highly personalised. Stream responses, pick the best model and watch results evolve live.

features.title: Everything you need in one workspace
features.subtitle: Conversational AI, automated plans, computer vision and progress dashboards wrapped in a secure and customisable environment.

adaptive.title: Adaptive nutrition
adaptive.description: Build meal plans that respect preferences, allergies and metabolic goals with automatic adjustments.

workout.title: Intelligent workout coach
workout.description: Create micro and macro cycles that balance strength, mobility and recovery with minimal effort.

vision.title: Computer vision
vision.description: Snap meals or labels and receive full nutritional analysis, portion tips and immediate alerts.

progress.title: Progress tracking
progress.description: Centralise metrics, photos and weekly notes with exportable PDF reports for your clients.

workflow.title: Launch. Assist. Iterate.
workflow.subtitle: Automate data collection, plan creation and intelligent adjustments while keeping human control.

one.title: Workspace ready in minutes
one.description: Import clients via CSV, send invites or collect health history with smart onboarding forms.

two.title: Assistant launches the first plan
two.description: Set goals and restrictions and the AI engine delivers ready-to-share meal and workout plans.

three.title: Continuous automated feedback
three.description: The chatbot tracks daily habits, gathers feedback and flags adjustments for the coach.

nocode.title: No-code setup
nocode.description: Connect Supabase, Stripe and OpenAI through guided wizards and guardrails.

security.title: Security & compliance
security.description: Infrastructure built for GDPR with encrypted data and auditable logs.

scale.title: Scale without limits
scale.description: Serverless architecture ready to grow from 10 to 10,000 users without maintenance pain.

testimonials.title: Trusted by health pros
testimonials.subtitle: Feedback from coaches, nutritionists and digital product founders using NutriFit AI.

ana.name: Ana Marques
ana.quote: NutriFit AI freed hours of repetitive planning so I can focus on listening to my clients and elevating human support.

joao.name: João Duarte
joao.quote: Training suggestions stay consistent and I gain visibility on athlete fatigue before injuries show up.

beatriz.name: Beatriz Gonçalves
beatriz.quote: We launched a digital product in weeks. The chatbot makes the experience fun and improves retention every month.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: We maintain an up-to-date knowledge base. Message the team if you don't find your answer.

replace.question: Does the AI replace health professionals?
replace.answer: No. NutriFit AI automates repetitive work and suggests options but keeps experts in control of each decision.

macros.question: How are macros calculated?
macros.answer: We combine validated protocols (Mifflin-St Jeor, Harris-Benedict) with the latest user feedback and biometrics.

branding.question: Can I customise the branding?
branding.answer: Yes. Adjust logo, colours, typography and custom domains so the experience matches your brand.

mobile.question: Is there a dedicated mobile app?
mobile.answer: Native iOS and Android apps are in beta. The web experience is responsive and works offline meanwhile.

cta.title: Ready to co-create healthier journeys?
cta.subtitle: Spin up your workspace, invite your first clients and let NutriFit AI accelerate your delivery.

pricing.title: Plans for every stage
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that grows with your practice. All tiers include chatbot access, smart plans and integrations.

free.title: Free
free.description: Validate NutriFit AI with zero commitment.

pro.title: Pro
pro.description: Ideal for nutritionists and personal trainers with active client rosters.

elite.title: Elite
elite.description: For studios and gyms that need full automation and dedicated consulting.

signup.title: Create your account
signup.subtitle: Start building intelligent plans in minutes.

errors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.

chat.title: NutriFit AI Assistant
chat.subtitle: Share goals, photos or metrics and receive recommendations in seconds.
chat.placeholder: Write a message or upload a meal photo…

chat.quotaError: You reached the daily message limit. Upgrade your plan for more volume.

model.label: Active model
model.description: Preference is shared with your dashboard and applied to new prompts.

chat.tip: Tip: share goals, restrictions or schedule to receive precise recommendations.

dashboard.subtitle: Stay in control of your workspace, pick the ideal AI model and monitor real impact.

radar.title: Usage radar
radar.subtitle: Monitor message and vision consumption in real time.

models.title: Chat models
models.subtitle: Select how NutriFit responds to new prompts.

fitai_fast: Best for mobile and routine questions
fitai_detailed: Great for weekly plans and periodisation

integration.title: Backend integration
integration.subtitle: Send the model field so NutriFit AI responds with the selected engine.
integration.note: The backend streams responses via SSE. Close the connection once you receive the end event.

history.title: Progress log
history.subtitle: Entries saved via chatbot or external integrations.
history.empty: No records yet. Ask the chatbot to log the first one.

settings.title: Preferences & configuration
settings.subtitle: Adjust chatbot behaviour, sync your preferences and control the interface look & feel.

model.title: Chat model
model.subtitle: Shared across dashboard and chat for future prompts.

preferences.title: Chat preferences
preferences.subtitle: Define how the chat behaves locally on this device.

suggestions.label: Smart suggestions
suggestions.description: Display quick prompts when you open a new conversation.

autoscroll.label: Auto-scroll on replies
autoscroll.description: Disable if you prefer controlling the conversation position manually.

preferences.local: Settings are stored locally on this device.

admin.title: Administrator console
admin.subtitle: Manage users, subscriptions and monitor NutriFit AI usage.
admin.adminInfo: Admins can list users and manage plans. Add authorised emails via the backend setting ADMIN_EMAILS.

errors.noPermission: You do not have administrator permissions.
